title: An apologie or answere in defence of the Churche of Englande with a briefe and plaine declaration of the true religion professed and vsed in the same.
author: Jewel, John, 1522-1571.
notes: A translation, by Lady Anne Bacon, of Jewel, John. Apologia Ecclesiæ Anglicanæ.
Dedication to Lady Bacon signed: M.C. [i.e. Matthew Parker. Cantuariensis]--Cf. STC.
Q8r-R6r contains "The manner how the Churche of Englande is administred & governed".
Running title reads: An apologie of the Churche of England.
Cf. Folger Catalog which has signatures pi⁴ A-R (R lacking, probably blank).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
